mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEM_NO, MEM_ID, PASSWORD1, PASSWORD2, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, SEX, BIRTHDAY, ZIPCODE, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, ADDRESS_ADD, JOIN_DATE ) VALUES ( MEMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{MEM_ID}, #{PASSWORD1}, #{PASSWORD2}, #{NAME}, #{PHONE}, #{EMAIL}, #{SEX}, #{BIRTHDAY}, #{ZIPCODE}, #{ADDRESS1}, #{ADDRESS2}, #{ADDRESS_ADD}, SYSDATE )

INSERT INTO PROFILE_FILE ( PROFILE_NO, MEM_ID, PROFILE_ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, PROFILE_STORED_FILE_NAME, PROFILE_FILE_SIZE, PROFILE_DATE ) VALUES ( PROFILE_FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{MEM_ID}, #{PROFILE_ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME}, #{PROFILE_STORED_FILE_NAME}, #{PROFILE_FILE_SIZE}, SYSDATE )

INSERT INTO PROFILE_FILE ( PROFILE_NO, MEM_ID, PET_MEM_ID, PROFILE_ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, PROFILE_STORED_FILE_NAME, PROFILE_FILE_SIZE, PROFILE_DATE ) VALUES ( PROFILE_FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{MEM_ID}, #{PET_MEM_ID}, #{PROFILE_ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME}, #{PROFILE_STORED_FILE_NAME}, #{PROFILE_FILE_SIZE}, SYSDATE )

INSERT INTO PET_MEMBER_ADD ( PET_MEMBER_ADD_NO, ID, PET_MEM_ID, PET_MEMBER_ADD_RESPONSE, PET_MEMBER_ADD_HUMAN, PET_MEMBER_ADD_BARK, PET_MEMBER_ADD_TRAINING, PET_MEMBER_ADD_DDONG_STYLE, PET_MEMBER_ADD_SHARP_BODY, PET_MEMBER_ADD_ATTACK, PET_MEMBER_ADD_VACCINATION ) VALUES ( PET_MEMBER_ADD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ID}, #{PET_MEM_ID}, #{PET_MEMBER_ADD_RESPONSE}, #{PET_MEMBER_ADD_HUMAN}, #{PET_MEMBER_ADD_BARK}, #{PET_MEMBER_ADD_TRAINING}, #{PET_MEMBER_ADD_DDONG_STYLE}, #{PET_MEMBER_ADD_SHARP_BODY}, #{PET_MEMBER_ADD_ATTACK}, #{PET_MEMBER_ADD_VACCINATION} )
